Description: Papyrus. Demotic letter. Recto: 20 lines of text; beginning lost. Verso: blank.
Curator's comments: No external address (although this may have been written on the now lost top of the papyrus). Hand: Ptolemaic. Provenance: unknown.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (107429) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/107429)
